title: Internationales Rankedteam 5vs5/3vs3
body:
Hey guys/girls,
we (a friend and me, spanish and german) are looking for more players to create a ranked team around Platinum level.
Looking for any role, the current players can fill. You should be able to play atleast 2-3 current-meta champs for your prefered position.
Around Platinum level, means gold3-platin2. We were platin2 last season , currently in platin4.

If interested add Fridoiin and/or Ã‘zasbf on EUW for more information.

Looking forward hearing from you :)

replies.body:
Hey, im gold 1 atm and from germany. Add me for more Information.

Mfg
